confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
account_verification_desc: To verify your identity, please upload images of your ID or verification documents. Our team will review your submission and get back to you shortly.
verification_submitted: Your verification has been submitted and is under review. You cannot reapply while it is pending.
click_to_upload: Click to select images (PNG or JPG)
verification_submitted_desc: Your verification has been submitted. We’ll notify you once it’s reviewed.
verification_rejected_desc: Your verification request has been rejected, please contact our support team.
